venue.address_1: Charge Pond Road & Fearing Pond Road
venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest- Charge pond gate

item.description:
Let's tour the great southeast section of the park and see what mother nature has done. We can park at the gate leading to the Charge Pond Campground (at the intersection of Charge Pond Road and Fearing Pond Road)  and venture east towards New Grassy Pond and the scout camps and passing Fearing Pond on the return.

This hike would be about two hours and approximately 5 miles long.  Bring water and snacks. Traction devices may be required if snow or ice persists.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: March to the end
